sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: We believe in investing in scientific research.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信科学研究的投资价值。

sentences.english: the limits of scientific knowledge
sentences.chinese: 科学知识的极限

sentences.english: decisions based on scientific evidence
sentences.chinese: 根据科学证据作出的决定

sentences.english: the international scientific community (= scientists )
sentences.chinese: 国际科学界

detailed_translations.english: about or related to science, or using its methods

sentences.english: He explained scientifically the most important questions of political economy.
sentences.chinese: 他科学地阐述了政治经济学中一些最重要的问题。

sentences.english: The object of this society is to perfect its members practically and scientifically.
sentences.chinese: 这个社团的目的是实际地、科学地及充分地指导其成员。

sentences.english: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.chinese: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works or is trained in science

name: scope
trans: n.（活动，影响能力等的）范围

sentences.english: measures to limit the scope of criminals’ activities
sentences.chinese: 限制罪犯活动范围的措施

detailed_translations.english: the range of things that a subject, activity, book etc deals with

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

sentences.english: They tried to scramble up the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 他们想爬上悬崖。

sentences.english: The village was a 20-minute scramble away.
sentences.chinese: 村子离这里有20分钟的攀登路程。

detailed_translations.english: to climb up, down, or over something quickly and with difficulty, especially using your hands to help you
a difficult climb in which you have to use your hands to help you

sentences.english: After the first few shots, people started screaming.
sentences.chinese: 几声枪响过后，人们开始尖叫起来。

sentences.english: a screaming baby
sentences.chinese: 尖声哭叫的婴儿

sentences.english: The children were screaming with laughter .
sentences.chinese: 小孩子们在尖声欢笑。

sentences.english: She was screaming her head off (= screaming a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 她不停地尖叫。

sentences.english: She began to scream blue murder (= scream very loudly ) .
sentences.chinese: 她开始高声尖叫。

sentences.english: He was dragged kicking and screaming to a nearby van.
sentences.chinese: 他又踢又叫着被拖到附近的一辆小货车上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尖叫；呼啸；发出尖锐刺耳的声音；令人触目惊心
detailed_translations.english: to make a loud high noise with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 尖叫声；尖锐刺耳的声音；极其滑稽可笑的人
detailed_translations.english: a loud high sound that you make with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

sentences.english: Jay stripped his clothes off and ran into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.english: Most exports went by sea .
sentences.chinese: 大部分出口商品都走海路。

sentences.english: a little cottage by the sea
sentences.chinese: 一座海滨小屋

sentences.english: He spent over 30 years at sea .
sentences.chinese: 他在船上工作了30多年。

sentences.english: They stood side by side looking out to sea .
sentences.chinese: 他们并排站着眺望大海。

detailed_translations.english: the large area of salty water that covers much of the Earth’s surface

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

sentences.english: It was too dark to search further.
sentences.chinese: 天太暗，无法继续寻找。

sentences.english: The area was thoroughly searched .
sentences.chinese: 这一地区已被彻底搜查过。

sentences.english: I’ve searched high and low (= everywhere ) for my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 我到处找我的眼镜。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find someone or something by looking very carefully
an attempt to find someone or something

sentences.english: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
sentences.chinese: 换季对植物的影响

detailed_translations.english: one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
to add salt, pepper etc to food you are cooking

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: So the next time you see a chunk of seaweed ... notice the beauty of it, yes.
sentences.chinese: 所以下次你碰见一大片海藻时，要毫不犹豫的欣赏它的美。

sentences.english: The crabs come closer to shore at this time of year, Child said, where they feed on the seaweed.
sentences.chinese: 这些螃蟹每年这个时间，要来到这里海岸的边上，恰尔特说，它们以吃海藻为生。

sentences.english: In many places, like Japan, people get iodine from seafood, seaweed, vegetables grown in iodine-rich soil or animals that eat grass grown in that soil.
sentences.chinese: 像日本等许多地方，人们通过食用海鲜、海藻得到碘，还可以从生长在高碘土壤里的蔬菜或食草动物那里得到碘。

detailed_translations.english: a plant that grows in the sea

name: second
trans: num.第二 a.第二的 n.秒

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

name: secondary
trans: a.第二位的，次要的；中等的

sentences.english: the novel’s secondary characters
sentences.chinese: 这本小说中的次要人物

detailed_translations.chinese: 第二的；中等的；次要的；中级的
detailed_translations.english: not as important as something else

sentences.english: Firstly, they are not efficient, and secondly, they are expensive to make.
sentences.chinese: 首先，它们效率不高，其次，它们的制作成本很高。

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to give a second point or fact, or give a second reason for something

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

name: section
trans: n.章节，部分；部门，科；截面，剖面

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.chinese: 吸烟区

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

name: securely
trans: ad.安全地；稳固地；有把握地

sentences.english: Customers can now buy products securely over the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 如今顾客可以安全放心地在网上购物了。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that protects something from being stolen or lost

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.english: lax security at airline check-in desks
sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.english: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.chinese: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.english: The prison was ordered to tighten security after a prisoner escaped yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.chinese: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.english: The security forces opened fire, killing two people.
sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.english: The thief was caught on a security camera .
sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.english: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.english: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .
sentences.chinese: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。

detailed_translations.english: things that are done to keep a person, building, or country safe from danger or crime

sentences.english: The moment we saw the house, we knew we wanted to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 我们一看到这房子就知道我们要买。

sentences.english: He crouched down so he couldn’t be seen.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲下来好让别人看不见他。

sentences.english: Can I see your ticket, please?
sentences.chinese: 我能看看你的票吗？

sentences.english: I saw the offer advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上看到这个减价的广告。

sentences.english: Have you seen Chris (= do you know where he is ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你见过克里斯吗？

sentences.english: The accommodation was so awful it had to be seen to be believed (= you would not believe it if you did not see it yourself ) .
sentences.chinese: 住宿条件太糟了，不是亲眼所见是不会相信的。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or examine someone or something, using your eyes

sentences.english: He’s been top seed for the past two years.
sentences.chinese: 他在过去两年中一直是头号种子选手。

detailed_translations.chinese: 种子；根据；精液；萌芽；子孙；原由
detailed_translations.english: a player or team in a competition that is given a particular position, according to how likely they are to win
to remove seeds from fruit or vegetables

sentences.english: new graduates seeking employment
sentences.chinese: 正在求职的刚毕业的大学生

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.
sentences.chinese: 驾车者被告知需另寻其他路线。

sentences.english: They quickly sought to distance themselves from the protesters.
sentences.chinese: 他们迅速设法远离抗议者。

detailed_translations.english: to look for someone or something

sentences.english: Ann didn’t seem very sure.
sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.english: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

detailed_translations.english: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true

sentences.english: seemingly unrelated bits of information
sentences.chinese: 似乎互不相关的零星信息

detailed_translations.english: appearing to have a particular quality, when this may or may not be true

name: Seine
trans: 塞纳河（法国北部河流，流经巴黎）

sentences.english: increased seismic activity
sentences.chinese: 越来越频繁的地震活动

detailed_translations.chinese: 地震的；因地震而引起的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or caused by  earthquakes

sentences.english: Suddenly he seized my hand.
sentences.chinese: 他突然抓住我的手。

sentences.english: The rebels have seized power.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子夺取了政权。

sentences.english: The gunmen were seized at 1 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 这几名持枪歹徒在凌晨1点被抓获。

detailed_translations.english: to take hold of something suddenly and violently

sentences.english: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

detailed_translations.english: very rarely or almost never

name: select
trans: vt./vi.选择，挑选，选拔 a.精选的

sentences.english: The party was small and select.
sentences.chinese: 团里人员不多，都是经过精心挑选的。

sentences.english: Honorary degrees are handed out to a select few .
sentences.chinese: 荣誉学位颁给挑选出的少数几个人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精选的， 挑选出来的； 优等的， 第一流的
detailed_translations.english: a select group of people or things is a small special group that has been chosen carefully
to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc

sentences.english: a child’s developing sense of self
sentences.chinese: 儿童逐渐形成的自我意识

detailed_translations.english: the type of person you are, your character, your typical behaviour etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使自花授精；使近亲繁殖

sentences.english: If you offer him another hundred, I think he’ll sell.
sentences.chinese: 如果你再加一百元钱，我想他会卖的。

sentences.english: He regrets selling all his old records.
sentences.chinese: 他后悔把所有的老唱片都卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone in exchange for money

sentences.english: ...a flower seller.
sentences.chinese: …一个卖花的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who sells something

sentences.english: Lyn sent some pictures of the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 琳恩寄了几张婚礼照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: [sent-sent] 送， 寄； 派遣， 打发； 发送； 发射
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post

name: senior
trans: a.年长的；大学四年级的 n.年长者

sentences.english: Seniors can get a 10% discount.
sentences.chinese: 老年人可以享受10%的折扣。

detailed_translations.english: a  senior citizen

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

name: senseless
trans: a.无感觉的；愚蠢的，无意义的

sentences.english: Her death seemed such a senseless waste of life.
sentences.chinese: 她的死真是无谓地浪费生命。

sentences.english: a senseless crime
sentences.chinese: 无目的的犯罪行为

detailed_translations.english: happening or done for no good reason or with no purpose

name: sensible
trans: a.感觉得到的；明智的，明白事理的

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.english: sensible advice
sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.english: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.english: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

name: sensibly
trans: ad.感觉得到地；明智地，明白事理地

sentences.english: a very sensitive child
sentences.chinese: 一个很敏感的小孩

sentences.english: a highly sensitive electronic camera
sentences.chinese: 高敏感度的电子摄像机

detailed_translations.english: easily upset or offended by events or things that people say

sentences.english: Each user should have access to a security level based upon the level of data sensitivity he or she can see.
sentences.chinese: 根据用户可以看到的数据的敏感性级别，每个用户都应该可以访问某个安全级别。

sentences.english: The authentication mode you choose for your environment will be determined by the level of sensitivity of your data.
sentences.chinese: 应该为您的环境选择什么样的身份验证模式，这是由数据的敏感级别来决定的。

sentences.english: The sensitivity of the test meets WHO standards for detecting the toxin in drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试的灵敏度满足了世界卫生组织探测饮用水毒物的标准。

sentences.english: sensory stimuli such as music
sentences.chinese: 音乐等的感官刺激

sentences.english: sensory deprivation
sentences.chinese: 感觉丧失

detailed_translations.english: relating to or using your senses of sight, hearing, smell, taste, or touch

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

sentences.english: the spread of nationalist sentiments
sentences.chinese: 民族主义情绪的传播

sentences.english: the anti-immigrant sentiments expressed by some Americans
sentences.chinese: 一些美国人表露出的反移民情绪

detailed_translations.english: a feeling or an opinion, especially one based on emotions

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

sentences.english: the separation of church and state
sentences.chinese: 政教分离

detailed_translations.chinese: 分离，分开；间隔，距离；[法] 分居；缺口
detailed_translations.english: when something separates or is separate

sentences.english: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.chinese: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.english: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.chinese: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.english: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

detailed_translations.english: the ninth month of the year, between August and October

sentences.english: The child’s face was serene and beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 这孩子的神情宁静可爱。

sentences.english: a serene mountain lake
sentences.chinese: 静谧的山间湖泊

detailed_translations.chinese: 平静的；安详的；清澈的；晴朗的
detailed_translations.english: very calm or peaceful

name: series
trans: n.一系列，连续；丛书，套；[电]串联

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is not enough of something that people need

sentences.english: The days are shortening.
sentences.chinese: 白天变得越来越短了。

detailed_translations.english: to become shorter or make something shorter

sentences.english: He never had a heart attack, but that surgery was similarly prompted by complaints about chest pain and shortness of breath.
sentences.chinese: 他没有心脏病发作过，但是这个手术也同样被提示关于胸痛和气短的疾病。

sentences.english: A panic attack victim usually suffers at least four of the previously mentioned symptoms, while a heart attack victim often experiences only pain and shortness of breath.
sentences.chinese: 一位恐怖症患者通常至少会有本文先前提到的上述四种症状，而心脏病发作时患者通常只有疼痛和呼吸短促。

sentences.english: Environmentalists fear that this is a shortsighted approach to the problem of global warming.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护主义者们担心这会是解决全球变暖问题的一个目光短浅的方法。

detailed_translations.english: If someone is shortsighted about something, or if their ideas are shortsighted, they do not make proper or careful judgments about the future

name: shot
trans: n.射击；弹丸，子弹；射门，投篮

sentences.english: In the opening shot, we see Travolta’s feet walking down the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 在开场的镜头中，我们看到特拉沃尔塔的脚在人行道上行走。

detailed_translations.english: the view of something in a film or television programme that is produced by having the camera in a particular position

detailed_translations.chinese: 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的
detailed_translations.english: in bad condition because of being used too much or treated badly

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

sentences.english: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.english: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

detailed_translations.english: to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc

sentences.english: There’s no need to shout! I can hear you!
sentences.chinese: 用不着大声喊叫！我听得见！

sentences.english: ‘Watch out!’she shouted, as the car started to move.
sentences.chinese: “小心！”汽车开动时，她大声喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something very loudly
a loud call expressing anger, pain, excitement etc

sentences.english: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.english: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.english: Mary showed great interest in the children.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映
detailed_translations.english: to let your feelings, attitudes, or personal qualities be clearly seen

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观
detailed_translations.english: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes

detailed_translations.chinese: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
detailed_translations.english: to let someone see something

sentences.english: Why does the phone always ring when I’m in the shower?
sentences.chinese: 为什么电话铃总是在我洗澡的时候响？

sentences.english: I’d like to use the shower if that’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我想用一下这里的淋浴。

sentences.english: The bathroom has a separate shower cubicle (= a shower in a separate part of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫生间里有一个独立的淋浴间。

sentences.english: I need a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我需要洗个淋浴。

sentences.english: Mike shaved and showered.
sentences.chinese: 迈克刮了脸，冲了个淋浴。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you stand under to wash your whole body
to wash your whole body while standing under a shower

sentences.english: I’m worried about washing that shirt in case it shrinks.
sentences.chinese: 我不太敢洗那件衬衫，怕它会缩水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起皱； 收缩； 退缩， 畏缩
detailed_translations.english: to become smaller, or to make something smaller, through the effects of heat or water

sentences.english: Shut the window, Ellen!
sentences.chinese: 埃伦，把窗关上！

sentences.english: I heard his bedroom door shut.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他的卧室门关上了。

sentences.english: She lay down on her bed and shut her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 她在床上躺下，闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: He shut the drawer and turned the key.
sentences.chinese: 他关上抽屉，转动了钥匙。

detailed_translations.english: to close something, or to become closed
not open

sentences.english: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.english: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.english: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的
detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness
people who are ill

sentences.english: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 燃料在边境那边的法国要便宜些。

sentences.english: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.english: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.english: The restaurant was empty apart from another couple on the far side of the room (= the area that is furthest away from you ) .
sentences.chinese: 饭店里空空的，只有最那边还有一对夫妇。

sentences.english: He is in charge of the civilian side of the UN mission.
sentences.chinese: 他在联合国使团中负责平民方面的事务。

sentences.english: Frank sided with David against their mother.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克站在戴维一边反对妈妈。

sentences.english: Hannah slipped out through a side exit.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜从一个侧门溜了出去。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two areas that are on the left or the right of an imaginary line, or on the left or the right of a border, wall, river etc
to support or argue against a person or group in a quarrel, fight etc
in or on the side of something

sentences.english: Anne’s sight is very good for someone of her age.
sentences.chinese: 安妮的视力对于她这个年龄的人来说算是非常好的。

sentences.english: He began to lose his sight six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前他开始视力衰退。

sentences.english: an emergency operation to save his sight
sentences.chinese: 挽救他视力的紧急手术

sentences.english: You will get a free sight test if you are under 16.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不满16岁，可以免费检查视力。

detailed_translations.english: the physical ability to see
to see something from a long distance away, or see something you have been looking for

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

sentences.english: He pressed the red alarm signal to see if it was on or off.
sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

detailed_translations.english: important
a sound or action that you make in order to give information to someone or tell them to do something
to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

name: significantly
trans: ad.有意义地，意味深长地；重大地

sentences.english: The Democrats, significantly, finished well behind the Green Party.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，民主党的得票数远远落后于绿党。

detailed_translations.chinese: 意味深长地，值得注目地
detailed_translations.english: used to say that something is very important

sentences.english: Some tribes use special facial markings to signify status.
sentences.chinese: 有些部落使用特殊的面部标记来表示地位。

sentences.english: The image of the lion signified power and strength.
sentences.chinese: 狮子的形象代表权力和力量。

sentences.english: These figures don’t really signify in the overall results.
sentences.chinese: 这些数字对于总体结果影响不是很大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表示,意味；要紧,有重要性
detailed_translations.english: to represent, mean, or be a sign of something

sentences.english: There was a brief silence before anyone answered.
sentences.chinese: 沉默了片刻才有人回答。

sentences.english: ‘Silence in court!’ roared the judge.
sentences.chinese: “法庭上请保持肃静！”法官吼道。

sentences.english: The accused exercised his right to silence (= the legal right to choose to say nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 被告行使了沉默权。

sentences.english: She held up her hand to silence the children.
sentences.chinese: 她抬手示意孩子们安静下来。

detailed_translations.english: complete quiet because nobody is talking
to make someone stop talking, or stop something making a noise

sentences.english: The large house was silent and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大房子寂静荒凉。

sentences.english: At last the guns fell silent .
sentences.chinese: 枪声终于沉寂了下来。

sentences.english: Julie offered up a silent prayer that she would pass her exam.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉默默地祈祷，希望能通过这次考试。

sentences.english: Alan was silent.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦沉默不语。

detailed_translations.english: without any sound, or not making any sound

sentences.english: pure silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: a thin smooth soft cloth made from very thin thread which is produced by a silkworm

sentences.english: The silver spoon tarnished.
sentences.chinese: 银匙失去光泽了。

sentences.english: Her teeth were capped with silver.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿是包了银的。

sentences.english: The workers parted gold from silver in the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 在车间里工人们把金子从银子中提炼出来。

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

sentences.english: They are both blonde, but there the similarity ends .
sentences.chinese: 他们俩都是金发，但相同之处也就仅此而已。

detailed_translations.english: if there is a similarity between two things or people, they are similar in some way

sentences.english: The first letter she wrote me was less than a page long, and her second letter was similarly brief.
sentences.chinese: 她写给我的第一封信不到一页，第二封信也一样简短。

sentences.english: The cost of food and clothing has come down in recent years. Similarly, fuel prices have fallen quite considerably.
sentences.chinese: 吃穿的费用近年来下降了。 同样地，燃料价格也有大幅 回落。

detailed_translations.english: in a similar way

sentences.english: Completing the race is not just a simple matter of physical fitness.
sentences.chinese: 跑完比赛不仅仅是纯粹的体力问题。

sentences.english: I’m afraid Luke’s a bit simple.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得卢克有点笨。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that only one thing is involved

sentences.english: an attempt to simplify the tax system
sentences.chinese: 简化税制的尝试

sentences.english: The law needs to be simplified.
sentences.chinese: 这部法律需要简化。

sentences.english: a simplified version of the game
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏的简化版

detailed_translations.english: to make something easier or less complicated

sentences.english: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.english: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.english: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

detailed_translations.english: if you say or explain something simply, you say it in a way that is easy for people to understand

sentences.english: a machine that simulates conditions in space
sentences.chinese: 一台模拟太空环境的机器

sentences.english: Interviews can be simulated in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 可以在教室里模拟面试。

detailed_translations.english: to make or produce something that is not real but has the appearance or feeling of being real

name: simultaneously
trans: ad.同时发生地，同时进行地

sentences.english: If they have multiple test cases that will be run on the same platforms, they can select multiple configurations simultaneously and apply the configurations to several of them in batch mode.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们拥有多个将要运行在同一个平台上的测试用例的话，那么他们能够同时选择多个配置，并且将这些配置批量应用到平台上。

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting here since two o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 我们从两点钟开始就在这里等了。

sentences.english: I haven’t played rugby since I left university.
sentences.chinese: 我大学毕业后就没打过橄榄球。

sentences.english: She left London ten years ago, and I haven’t seen her since.
sentences.chinese: 她十年前离开伦敦，此后我再没有见过她。

sentences.english: The factory has been here since the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂从 20 世纪 70 年代起就在这里了。

sentences.english: It was exactly five years since her father had died.
sentences.chinese: 从她父亲去世到现在正好满五年。

sentences.english: Since the end of the war, over five thousand prisoners have been released.
sentences.chinese: 自从战争结束以后，已有五千多名战俘获释。

sentences.english: He lost his job five years ago, but has since found other work.
sentences.chinese: 他五年前失去工作，但此后找到了其他工作。

sentences.english: I left school in 1995, and since then I’ve lived in London.
sentences.chinese: 我 1995 年离开学校，此后就在伦敦生活。

sentences.english: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released.
sentences.chinese: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

detailed_translations.english: from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time

sentences.english: I don’t doubt her sincerity, but I think she’s got her facts wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我不怀疑她的诚意，但我认为她没弄清楚事实。

sentences.english: May I say in all sincerity that we could not have achieved this much without your help and support.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我真心诚意地说: 没有你们的帮助和支持，我们就不可能取得这样的成绩。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is sincere and really means what they are saying

sentences.english: She can sing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 她唱歌很好听。

sentences.english: Most children enjoy singing.
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都喜欢唱歌。

sentences.english: We had a great time singing some of the old songs .
sentences.chinese: 我们唱了一些老歌，非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to sing in tune (= sing the correct notes ) .
sentences.chinese: 我唱歌总是跑调。

sentences.english: She patiently sang the baby to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 她耐心地唱歌哄宝宝入睡。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a musical sound with your voice

name: Singapore
trans: 新加坡岛；新加坡；新加坡市

sentences.english: I come from Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 我来自新加坡。

sentences.english: But not in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 但是在新加坡就不同了。

sentences.english: After staying a few days in Shanghai, he moved on to Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 在上海逗留了几天之后，他又启程去新加坡。

sentences.english: the lead singer (= main singer ) of Slade
sentences.chinese: 施莱德乐队的主唱

sentences.english: Tina Turner’s backing singers
sentences.chinese: 蒂纳·特纳的伴唱歌手

detailed_translations.english: someone who sings

sentences.english: A single tree gave shade from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 唯有一棵树遮阴。

sentences.english: They won the game by a single point.
sentences.chinese: 他们仅以一分的优势赢得比赛。

sentences.english: the highest price ever paid for a single work of art
sentences.chinese: 为单件艺术品所支付的最高价格

sentences.english: a single-sex school
sentences.chinese: 单一性别的学校

detailed_translations.english: only one
a ticket for a trip from one place to another but not back again

sentences.english: Their motorboat struck a rock and began to sink.
sentences.chinese: 他们的摩托艇触了礁，开始下沉。

sentences.english: The kids watched as the coin sank to the bottom of the pool.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们看着那枚硬币沉到池底。

sentences.english: The heavy guns sank up to their barrels in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 这些沉重的大炮深陷在泥里，只露出炮管。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下沉，沉没；降低，下落；陷入；衰退，恶化
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使下沉，使沉没；降低；掘，挖，凿
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 水槽， 水池， 洗涤槽
detailed_translations.english: a large open container that you fill with water and use for washing yourself, washing dishes etc

sentences.english: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.english: Can I help you, sir?
sentences.chinese: 我能为您效劳吗，先生？

sentences.english: Sir! You dropped your wallet.
sentences.chinese: 先生！ 您的钱包掉了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师
detailed_translations.english: used when speaking to a man in order to be polite or show respect

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

sentences.english: The parliament building sits in a large square.
sentences.chinese: 议会大楼位于一个大广场上。

sentences.english: He’s got a computer sitting on his desk, but he doesn’t use it.
sentences.chinese: 他有一台电脑放在书桌上，但他不用。

sentences.english: My climbing boots were sitting unused in a cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我的登山靴在橱柜里，一直没有穿。

sentences.english: The house has sat empty for two years.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子已经空置两年了。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or condition

detailed_translations.chinese: (Sit)人名；(东南亚国家华语)硕；(罗)西特

sentences.english: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.english: the type of area where a building is situated - used especially by people who sell or advertise buildings

sentences.english: six months ago
sentences.chinese: 六个月前

sentences.english: She arrived just after six (= six o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 她六点刚过就到了。

sentences.english: He learnt to play the violin when he was six (= six years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他六岁学拉小提琴。

detailed_translations.english: the number 6
the number 6

sentences.english: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

sentences.chinese: 我刚煮了一壶咖啡，你想喝点吗？

sentences.chinese: “你知道螺丝钉在哪儿吗？”“车库里有一些。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 一些；某个；大约；相当多的
一些；若干；其中的一部分；（数量不确切时用）有些人
detailed_translations.english: a number of people or things or an amount of something, when the exact number or amount is not stated
a fairly large number or amount of something

sentences.english: There’s somebody waiting to see you.
sentences.chinese: 有人等着要见你。

sentences.english: Somebody’s car alarm kept me awake all night.
sentences.chinese: 不知谁的汽车警报器吵得我整晚都无法入睡。

sentences.english: ‘Who can we get to babysit?’ ‘I’ll call Suzie or somebody .’
sentences.chinese: “我们能请谁来看小孩呢？”“我会叫苏齐或别的什么人。”

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know, or do not say who the person is

sentences.english: Don’t worry, we’ll get the money back somehow.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我们总会把那些钱拿回来的。

sentences.english: Somehow, I managed to lose my keys.
sentences.chinese: 我不知怎的竟然把钥匙弄丢了。

sentences.english: Maybe we could glue it together somehow or other .
sentences.chinese: 也许我们可以想什么办法把它粘起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由于某种原因， 不知怎么的； 以某种方式
detailed_translations.english: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how

sentences.english: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.chinese: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.english: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
sentences.chinese: 谁能说说是怎么回事？

sentences.english: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.chinese: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is

sentences.english: There’s something in my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我眼睛里有什么东西。

sentences.english: Sarah said something about coming over later.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉说她等一会儿过来什么的。

sentences.english: I don’t know what he does exactly, but I know it has something to do with computers (= is related to them in some way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他具体是干什么的，只知道和电脑有关。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a particular thing when you do not know its name or do not know exactly what it is

detailed_translations.chinese: 重要的人；值得重视的事

sentences.english: The sales figures won't be released until sometime next month.
sentences.chinese: 销售数据要到下个月的某个时候才会公布。

sentences.english: Sir Richard Marsh, the sometime chairman of British Rail
sentences.chinese: 理查德•马什爵士，英国铁路公司前董事长

detailed_translations.english: at a time in the future or in the past, although you do not know exactly when
former

sentences.english: I sometimes have to work late.
sentences.chinese: 我有时得工作到很晚。

sentences.english: Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.english: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.chinese: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.english: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.chinese: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

detailed_translations.english: on some occasions but not always

sentences.english: Things have changed somewhat since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，情况就有些不一样了。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little but not very

sentences.english: My wallet must be around here somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 我的钱包肯定是在这里的什么地方。

sentences.english: We could meet for dinner at Giorgio’s or somewhere (= or a similar place ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在乔治家或别的什么地方一起吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: in or to a place, but you do not say or know exactly where

sentences.english: Her son Sean was born in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 她的儿子肖恩出生于 1983 年。

sentences.english: They have three sons and a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们有三个儿子和一个女儿。

sentences.english: In those days, the property went to the oldest son.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，财产由长子继承。

sentences.english: their youngest son, George
sentences.chinese: 他们最小的儿子乔治

detailed_translations.chinese: 儿子；孩子（对年轻人的称呼）；男性后裔
detailed_translations.english: someone’s male child

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.
sentences.chinese: …舞蹈、音乐、哑剧和歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

sentences.english: It will be dark soon.
sentences.chinese: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.english: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.chinese: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿
detailed_translations.english: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens

sentences.english: She was very sorry about all the trouble she'd caused.
sentences.chinese: 她对自己造成的麻烦感到很内疚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗憾的；对不起的，抱歉的
detailed_translations.english: feeling ashamed or unhappy about something bad you have done

detailed_translations.chinese: 对不起，抱歉（表示委婉的拒绝等）

sentences.english: Most of the victims developed psychological problems of one sort or another (= of various different types ).
sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.english: They do burgers, pizzas, that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

detailed_translations.english: a group or class of people, things etc that have similar qualities or features
to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc

sentences.english: India and Nepal have sorted out their trade and security dispute.
sentences.chinese: 印度和尼泊尔已经解决了他们的贸易和安全争端。

detailed_translations.english: If you sort out a problem or the details of something, you do what is necessary to solve the problem or organize the details

sentences.english: the immortality of the soul
sentences.chinese: 灵魂的不灭

sentences.english: It was as if those grey eyes could see into the very depths of her soul .
sentences.chinese: 仿佛那双灰眼睛能看到她的灵魂深处。

sentences.english: the souls of the dead
sentences.chinese: 亡灵

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person that is not physical, and that contains their character, thoughts, and feelings. Many people believe that a person’s soul continues to exist after they have died.

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

sentences.english: Which way is south?
sentences.chinese: 哪面是南？

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun.
towards the south
in the south, or facing the south

sentences.english: a southern accent
sentences.chinese: 南部口音

sentences.english: Southern Italy
sentences.chinese: 意大利南部

detailed_translations.english: in or from the south of a country or area

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

sentences.english: I worked with him over a span of six years.
sentences.chinese: 我和他共事达六年之久。

sentences.english: The bridge crosses the river in a single span.
sentences.chinese: 河上的桥为单跨桥。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that sth lasts or is able to continue

sentences.english: Sorry, I can’t spare the time.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.english: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.english: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.english: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.chinese: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.english: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.chinese: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.english: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.chinese: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

detailed_translations.english: to make something such as time, money, or workers available for someone, especially when this is difficult for you to do
not being used or not needed at the present time

name: spark
trans: n.火花，火星 vi.发火花 vt.激发，引起

sentences.english: sparks from the fire
sentences.chinese: 火里飞出的火星

sentences.english: The scrape of metal on metal sent up a shower of sparks .
sentences.chinese: 金属之间互相摩擦，迸出一串火星。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together
a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together

name: sparkle
trans: n.发火花；闪耀，闪光 vi.发火花；闪耀

sentences.english: The sea sparkled in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下大海碧波闪耀。

sentences.english: The crystal chandelier sparkled.
sentences.chinese: 那水晶枝形吊灯闪闪发光。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发光，闪耀，闪烁；活跃，焕发
detailed_translations.english: to shine in small bright flashes

detailed_translations.chinese: 闪光， 闪耀， 闪烁； 活力， 生气
detailed_translations.english: a bright shiny appearance, with small points of flashing light

sentences.english: I was so shocked I couldn’t speak.
sentences.chinese: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.english: He spoke very softly (= quietly ) .
sentences.chinese: 他说话声音非常轻柔。

detailed_translations.english: to use your voice to produce words

sentences.english: The keynote speaker (= main or most important speaker ) was Robert Venturi, the architect.
sentences.chinese: 主要发言人是建筑师罗伯特·文图里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who makes a formal speech to a group of people

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.english: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.english: The good china was used only on special occasions .
sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

sentences.english: a heart specialist
sentences.chinese: 心脏专科医生

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: specific
trans: a.特有的，特定的；具体的，明确的

sentences.english: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.english: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

sentences.english: Payments will be made for a specified number of months.
sentences.chinese: 款项将在规定的几个月内支付。

sentences.english: They specified a spacious entrance hall.
sentences.chinese: 他们明确要求门厅要宽敞。

detailed_translations.english: to state something in an exact and detailed way

name: speculate
trans: vi.思索；推测vt.投机；思索，推测

sentences.english: She refused to speculate.
sentences.chinese: 她拒绝猜测。

detailed_translations.english: to guess about the possible causes or effects of something, without knowing all the facts or details

sentences.english: The witness’s statement was pure speculation (= not based on any facts ) .
sentences.chinese: 这名证人的陈述纯粹是猜测。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投机；推测；思索；投机买卖
detailed_translations.english: when you guess about the possible causes or effects of something without knowing all the facts, or the guesses that you make

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说
detailed_translations.english: a talk, especially a formal one about a particular subject, given to a group of people

sentences.english: Alex was almost speechless with rage and despair.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯一时因愤怒和绝望几乎说不出话来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说不出话的；哑的；非言语所能表达的
detailed_translations.english: unable to speak because you feel very angry, upset etc

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

sentences.english: You notice that your breathing has speeded up a bit.
sentences.chinese: 你注意到你的呼吸已加快了一点。

detailed_translations.english: When something speeds up or when you speed it up, it moves or travels faster

sentences.english: Sometimes the instruments are read-only, like your speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 有些仪器是只读的，就像速度计一样；

sentences.english: Once the speedometer is placed in a conventional sedan, the system test for the sedan would not road test it at 160 miles/hour.
sentences.chinese: 但是一旦将速度计安装到家用轿车里面时，对于整部轿车的系统测试将不会在公路上测试160英里/小时这一速度值。

sentences.english: A population study from Finland has developed a fascinating scale that can predict 20-year risk for dementia –sort of a brain aging speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 一项芬兰的人口学研究给出了一个引人注目的量表，能够预计20年罹患失忆症的风险，即一种大脑衰老的速度计。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument in a vehicle that shows how fast it is going

sentences.english: How do you spell ‘juice’?
sentences.chinese: juice 怎么拼？

sentences.english: Pupils should know how to spell commonly used words.
sentences.chinese: 小学生应该知道常用词的拼法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值
detailed_translations.english: to form a word by writing or naming the letters in order
a piece of magic that someone does, or the special words or ceremonies used in doing it

sentences.english: Her spelling has improved.
sentences.chinese: 她的拼写进步了。

sentences.english: an essay full of spelling mistakes
sentences.chinese: 一篇满是拼写错误的文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼字， 拼法， 拼写法
detailed_translations.english: the act of spelling words correctly, or the ability to do this

sentences.english: I can’t afford to spend any more money this week.
sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

sentences.english: The repairs cost a lot, but it’s money well spent (= a sensible way of spending money ) .
sentences.chinese: 修理费很高，但这是该花的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽
detailed_translations.english: to use your money to pay for goods or services

sentences.english: Because the earth spins, it is not a perfect sphere.
sentences.chinese: 因为地球旋转，所以它不是个完完全全的球体。

detailed_translations.english: a ball shape

detailed_translations.chinese: 包围；放入球内；使…成球形

sentences.english: Do you think that the spider can web anything?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这蜘蛛能用网捕住什么吗?

sentences.english: Why not hold spider of the week contests in your home throughout this season?
sentences.chinese: 在这整个蜘蛛出没的季节里，为什么不在你家里举行蜘蛛周竞赛？

sentences.english: Likewise, by these investigators’ logic, male arachnophobes should get a mild tickle down there whenever they spy a spider scurrying across their desk.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，按这些研究者的逻辑，男性蜘蛛恐惧者每次看到蜘蛛爬过桌子都应该下身瘙痒咯？

detailed_translations.english: a small creature with eight legs, which catches insects using a fine network of sticky threads

sentences.english: Katie almost spilled her milk.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂差点把牛奶洒出来。

detailed_translations.english: if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

sentences.english: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: split
trans: vi.撕裂；分裂 vt.劈开 n.分裂，裂口

sentences.english: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.english: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.chinese: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.english: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.chinese: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

detailed_translations.english: to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups
If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts

sentences.english: A classroom with 40 kids is more likely to split up into opposing groups than one with 20, which may explain why students tend to do better in smaller classes.
sentences.chinese: 一个有40个孩子的班级比一个只有20个孩子的班级更容易分裂，这也许可以解释为什么学生在人数较少的班级学得更好。

sentences.english: a White House spokesman
sentences.chinese: 白宫发言人

detailed_translations.english: a man who has been chosen to speak officially for a group, organization, or government

name: spontaneous
trans: a.自发的，本能的，自动的；出自自然的

sentences.english: The crowd gave a spontaneous cheer.
sentences.chinese: 人群自发地欢呼起来。

sentences.english: My spontaneous reaction was to run away.
sentences.chinese: 我的本能反应就是逃跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自发的， 无意识的； 自然的， 天真率直的
detailed_translations.english: something that is spontaneous has not been planned or organized, but happens by itself, or because you suddenly feel you want to do it

sentences.english: the sport of falconry
sentences.chinese: 放鹰狩猎运动

sentences.english: a demonstration by people opposed to blood sports
sentences.chinese: 反对猎杀动物运动的人士举行的示威游行

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑
detailed_translations.english: an activity that people do in the countryside, especially hunting or fishing
to play together happily

sentences.english: He’s a very keen sportsman .
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常喜爱运动的人。

sentences.english: a talented all-round sportsman
